actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution recognizing the Gila National Forest in New Mexico as the birthplace of the wilderness concept and the 50th anniversary of wilderness preservation to be celebrated throughout  1974.

summary.text: Recognizes the Gila National Forest in New Mexico as the birthplace of the wilderness concept. Provides the fiftieth anniversary of wilderness preservation to be celebrated throughout 1974.

titles.title: Joint resolution recognizing the Gila National Forest in New Mexico as the birthplace of the wilderness concept and the 50th anniversary of wilderness preservation to be celebrated throughout  1974.
